.home-ads .porto-ibanner-desc {

    font-weight: 700;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;

.home-ads .porto-ibanner-desc .porto-ibanner-content h4 {

.home-ads .porto-ibanner-desc .btn {

<style type="text/css">

}
.porto-ibanner-desc h2 {

}
.home-banner3 .porto-ibanner-desc h2 {

}
.porto-ibanner .porto-ibanner-desc {

    padding: 13% 15px;
}
.home-banner1 .porto-ibanner-desc {
    align-items: flex-end;

}
.home-banner2 .porto-ibanner-desc {

}
.home-banner4 .porto-ibanner-desc {

.homepage-bar {

cms_block.title: Porto - Homepage 24

<style type="text/css">

}
#banner-slider-demo-24 .slide-content {

#banner-slider-demo-24 .slide-content h3 {

#banner-slider-demo-24 .slide-price {

#banner-slider-demo-24 .slide-price-box ins {

}

}
#banner-slider-demo-24 a.btn.tocart {

    font-size: 14px;

    border-radius: 30px 0 0 30px;
    margin-right: 90px;
    overflow: visible;
    line-height: 36px;
    text-transform: uppercase;

    text-decoration: none;

}
#banner-slider-demo-24 a.btn.tocart:after {

    content: '\f054';
    font-family: 'Font Awesome 5 Free';
    padding: 9px 0;
    position: absolute;
    left: 100%;
    top: 0;
    height: 100%;

    margin-left: 5px;

}
#banner-slider-demo-24 .right-img .slide-content {

}
#banner-slider-demo-24 .right-img .slide-content h3 {

#banner-slider-demo-24 .right-img .slide-price {

}

@media (min-width: 575px) {

.custom-support {

}

}

}

}
.custom-shape.custom-shape-type2 {

}
a.btn.btn-custom {

    border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.09);

#brands-slider-demo-24 .owl-item {

}

}
.cms-index-index .testimonial-author .img-thumbnail {

.cms-index-index .testimonial-author .img-thumbnail img {

}

}
.cms-index-index .testimonial-author p >strong {
    color: #2b2b2d;

}
.cms-index-index blockquote.testimonial {
    background-color: transparent;

    font-family: "Open Sans";

    padding: 20px 50px 20px 60px;
    margin-top: 15px;
}
.cms-index-index blockquote.testimonial:before, .cms-index-index blockquote.testimonial:after {
    color: #ea6253;

}
.owl-theme.owl-bottomleft-narrow .owl-controls {

    left: 80px;
    bottom: 20px;
    margin: 0;
}
.owl-theme.owl-bottomleft-narrow .owl-controls .owl-page span {

.owl-theme.owl-bottomleft-narrow .owl-controls .owl-page.active span, .owl-theme.owl-bottomleft-narrow .owl-controls .owl-page:hover span {

.owl-theme.owl-bottomleft-narrow .owl-controls .owl-page.active span:after, .owl-theme.owl-bottomleft-narrow .owl-controls .owl-page:hover span:after {
    content: '';

    width: 3px;
    height: 3px;
    background-color: #05131c;

    border-radius: 50%;
}
.recent-posts .post-date {

}
.recent-posts .postTitle a {

}
.recent-posts .postTitle a:hover {

}
.recent-posts .postTitle {

}
.recent-posts .postContent {

}
.recent-posts a.readmore {

    font-size: 12px;

</style>

cms_block.title: Porto - Homepage 25
cms_block.content:
<style>
.main-container {
    display: none;
}
.bg-grey-gradient {
    background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom,#f4f4f4,#fff);
}
#main-slider-demo-25 img {
    width: 100%;
}
.category-product-item {
    position: relative;
    cursor: pointer;
}
.category-product-item:before {
    background-color: rgba(27, 27, 23, 0.01);
    content: "";
    transition: all 0.3s;
    bottom: 0;
    color: #FFF;
    left: 0;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    display: block;
    z-index: 1;
}
.owl-item > .item:hover > .category-product-item:before {
    background-color: rgba(27, 27, 23, 0.16);
}
.category-product-item > .cat-detail {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    text-align: center;
    top: 12%;
    color: #fff;
    z-index: 2;
}
.category-product-item + .category-products .product-item {
    width: 100%;
}
.category-product-item + .category-products {
    max-width: 50%;
    margin: -37% auto 0;
    z-index: 1;
    position: relative;
}
.category-product-item + .category-products .products-grid li.item {
    width: auto;
    padding: 0 !important;
}
.category-product-item + .category-products .products-grid li.item .item-area {
    padding: 0;
    border: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
}
@media (max-width: 991px) {
    .category-product-item + .category-products {
        max-width: 70%;
    }
}
.category-product-item .cat-detail h3 {
    font-size: 22px;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin: 0 0 10px;
    line-height: 1.35;
}
.category-product-item .cat-detail h5 {
    font-size: 14px;
    margin: -10px 0 0;
    font-weight: 500;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    line-height: 1.8;
    opacity: .7;
}
.category-product-item .cat-detail > a {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #fff;
    display: inline-block;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    margin-top: 4%;
    padding: 10px;
}
.category-product-item .cat-detail > a > i {
    margin-left: 8px;
}
.category-product-item + .category-products .item .details-area .actions, .category-product-item + .category-products a.quickview-icon, .category-product-item + .category-products .product-label {
    display: none;
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
    .category-product-item .cat-detail h3 {
        font-size: 18px;
    }
    .category-product-item .cat-detail h5 {
        font-size: 12px;
    }
}
#slideshow .category-products .products-grid.columns4 li.item:hover {
    padding: 10px;
}
.owl-middle-narrow .owl-theme .owl-controls .owl-nav [class*=owl-], .owl-middle-narrow.owl-theme .owl-controls .owl-nav [class*=owl-] {
    position: absolute;
    pointer-events: all;
}
.owl-middle-narrow .owl-theme .owl-controls, .owl-middle-narrow.owl-theme .owl-controls {
    margin: 0;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: -37px;
    visibility: hidden;
    opacity: 0;
    transition: all 0.2s;
    pointer-events: none;
}
.owl-theme .owl-controls .owl-nav [class*=owl-] {
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 17px;
    text-shadow: 0 0 3px rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
    margin: 5px;
    padding: 4px 7px;
    display: inline-block;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
    border-radius: 3px;
}
.owl-middle-narrow .owl-theme .owl-prev, .owl-middle-narrow.owl-theme .owl-prev {
    left: 0;
}
.owl-middle-narrow .owl-theme .owl-next, .owl-middle-narrow.owl-theme .owl-next {
    right: 0;
}
#main-slider-demo-25 .owl-middle-narrow.owl-theme .owl-controls {
    top: 32%;
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
}
.products-pd-1 > .category-products .products-grid .item .item-area {
    border: 0 !important;
    box-shadow: none !important;
    padding: 20px 40px 25px !important;
}
.products-pd-1 > .category-products .products-grid {
    margin: -1px;
}
.products-pd-1 > .category-products .products-grid .item .details-area .actions, .products-pd-1 > .category-products .products-grid a.quickview-icon, .products-pd-1 > .category-products .products-grid .product-label {
    display: none;
}
.price-box {
    white-space: nowrap;
}
.products-pd-1 > .category-products .products-grid li.item {
    padding: 1px !important;
}
form#home-footer-newsletter-validate-detail .input-box {
    max-width: 570px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    display: flex;
}
.cms-index-index input#newsletter-footer {
    border-radius: 24px 0 0 24px;
    background: #f4f4f4;
    border: none;
    height: 48px;
    font-size: 12px;
    font-style: italic;
    color: #777;
    outline: none;
    box-shadow: none;
    text-align: left;
    line-height: 1.42857;
    padding: 8px 12px;
    padding-left: 25px;
    font-family: inherit;
    flex: auto;
}
.cms-index-index input#newsletter-footer + button.button > span {
    padding-left: 25px;
    padding-right: 30px;
    border-radius: 0 24px 24px 0;
    height: 48px;
    font-size: 12px;
    font-weight: 700;
    background: #333;
    box-shadow: none;
    border: 0;
    line-height: 48px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}
.cms-index-index input#newsletter-footer + button.button span {
    font-size: 12px;
    font-weight: 700;
}
</style>

cms_block.title: Porto - Homepage 26
cms_block.content:
<style>
.main-container {

}

@media (min-width: 1260px) {

.homepage-bar .col-lg-4 {

}
.homepage-bar [class*=" porto-icon-"], .homepage-bar [class^=porto-icon-], .homepage-bar [class*=" porto-new-icon-"], .homepage-bar [class^=porto-new-icon-] {
    font-size: 32px;
}
.homepage-bar .row {
    margin: 0;
}
.homepage-bar .row > div {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}
.homepage-bar .col-lg-4 > * {
    display: inline-block;

}

    line-height: 1;
    margin-bottom: 3px;
}
@media (max-width: 991px) {

        border-top: 2px solid #fff;
    }
    .homepage-bar .col-lg-4:first-child {
        border-top: 0;
    }
}
.recent-posts .item .col-md-5, .recent-posts .item .col-md-7 {
    max-width: 100%;
    flex: 0 0 100%;
    position: static;
}
.recent-posts .item .post-image {
    padding: 0;
    border: 0;
    width: 100%;
    padding-top: 46%;
    position: relative;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
.recent-posts .item .post-image img {
    border-radius: 0;
    object-fit: cover;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    transition: transform .3s;
}
.recent-posts .item .post-image:hover img {
    transform: scale(1.2);
}
.recent-posts .post-date {
    float: none;
    display: inline-block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    margin: 10px 0 0 10px;
}
.recent-posts .post-date .day {
    background-color: #323232;
    color: #fff;
    padding-bottom: 0;
    line-height: 1;
    padding-top: 10px;
}
.recent-posts .post-date .month {
    background-color: #323232;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 13px;
    line-height: 1.2;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
}
.recent-posts .postTitle h2 a {
    color: #2b2b2b;
    font-size: 17px;
}
.recent-posts .postTitle h2 {
    font-size: 17px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 1.3;
    margin-bottom: 7px;
}
.recent-posts .postTitle {
    min-height: 0;
}
.recent-posts .postContent {
    line-height: 25px;
}
.recent-posts a.readmore {
    font-size: 13px;
    margin-left: 5px;
}
.newsletter-section form {
    width: 100%;
}
.newsletter-section .input-box {
    display: flex;
}
.newsletter-section .input-box > input {
    height: 48px;
    border-radius: 24px 0 0 24px;
    font-style: italic;
    font-size: 12px;
    padding-left: 20px;
    box-shadow: none;
    background-color: #fff;
    color: #777;
    border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.09);
    width: 100%;
    font-family: inherit;
}
.newsletter-section .input-box > button > span {
    padding: 10px 35px 10px 30px;
    border-radius: 0 24px 24px 0;
    height: 48px;
    color: #ffffff;
    background-color: #323232;
    border-color: #323232 #323232 #191919;
    line-height: 28px;
    font-family: inherit;
}
.recent-posts {
    margin: 0 -10px;
}
.recent-posts .item {
    padding: 0 10px;
}
</style>

cms_block.title: Porto - Homepage 27
cms_block.content:
<style>
.main-container {

}

}
.home-slider:before {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height: 61%;
    display: block;
    background: #f7f6f7;
    content: '';
}
.owl-banner-carousel.owl-middle-narrow .owl-controls .owl-buttons div {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
}
.owl-middle-narrow .owl-controls .owl-buttons div {
    font-size: 24px;
    color: #333;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}
.owl-middle-narrow .owl-controls {
    width: calc(100% + 60px);
    left: -30px;
}
.owl-middle-narrow .owl-controls .owl-buttons div.owl-prev {
    left: 0;
}
.owl-middle-narrow .owl-controls .owl-buttons div.owl-next {
    right: 0;
}
.home-subcats {

.home-subcats .porto-sicon-box {

    margin: 0;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.home-subcats .left-icon .porto-sicon-body, .home-subcats .left-icon .porto-sicon-left {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
}
.home-subcats .left-icon .porto-sicon-left {
    margin-right: 15px;
}
.home-subcats .owl-controls {
    display: none;
}
.h-100 > .porto-ultimate-content-box {
    height: 100%;
    font-size: .6666vw;
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
    .h-100 > .porto-ultimate-content-box {
        min-height: 50vw;
        font-size: 1vw;
    }
}
</style>

cms_block.title: Porto - Homepage 28
cms_block.content:
<style>
.main-container {
    display: none;
}
.homepage-bar {
    border-top: 0;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
    border-bottom-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
    background-color: transparent;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 20px 0 10px;
}
.homepage-bar > .row > * {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}
.homepage-bar [class*=" icon-"], .homepage-bar [class^=icon-], .homepage-bar [class*=" porto-new-icon-"], .homepage-bar [class^=porto-new-icon-] {
    font-size: 35px;
    color: #333;
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: middle;
    line-height: 1;
}
.homepage-bar [class^="icon-"]:before, .homepage-bar [class*=" icon-"]:before, .homepage-bar [class^="porto-new-icon-"]:before, .homepage-bar [class*=" porto-new-icon-"]:before{
    vertical-align: middle;
}
.homepage-bar .text-area {
    color: #222529;
}
.homepage-bar h3 {

    margin-bottom: 3px;
    color: #222529;
}
.homepage-bar p {
    font-size: 13px;
    line-height: 15px;
    color: #777;
}
.recent-posts .item {
    padding: 0;
}
.recent-posts .item .post-image {
    position: relative;
    border: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
    padding: 0;
}
.recent-posts .item .post-image img {
    border-radius: 0;
    display: block;
}
.recent-posts .post-date {
    float: none;
    position: absolute;
    left: 12px;
    top: 12px;
    background-color: #606da6;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 15px;
}
.recent-posts .post-date .day {
    color: #fff;
    background-color: transparent;
    padding-bottom: 0;
    font-size: 28px;
    line-height: 1;
    padding: 0;
}
.recent-posts .post-date .month {
    background-color: transparent;
    padding: 0;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 1;
    margin-top: 4px;
    opacity: .5;
    width: auto;
}
@media (min-width: 1160px) {
    .recent-posts > .item > .row > .col-md-5 {
        flex: 0 0 50%;
        max-width: 50%;
    }
    .recent-posts > .item > .row > .col-md-7 {
        max-width: 50%;
        flex: 0 0 50%;
    }
}
.recent-posts .postCats > span {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 8px 15px;
    background: #222529;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 11px;
    font-weight: 600;
    text-indent: 0;
    line-height: 1;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    border-radius: .25rem;
    letter-spacing: 0.01em;
    vertical-align: middle;
}
.recent-posts .postCats {
    margin-bottom: 16px;
}
.recent-posts .postTitle {
    min-height: 0;
}
.recent-posts .postTitle h2 {
    margin-bottom: 12px;
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}
.recent-posts .postTitle h2 > a {
    color: #222529;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 1.3;
    letter-spacing: 0.3px;
}
.recent-posts .postContent {
    font-size: 13px;
    line-height: 25px;
    font-family: 'Open Sans';
    letter-spacing: 0.1px;
}
.recent-posts .postContent > p {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    line-height: 25px;
    display: -webkit-box;
    -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    overflow: hidden;
}
@media (min-width: 1440px) {
.recent-posts .postContent > p {
    -webkit-line-clamp: 3;
}
}
.recent-posts a.readmore {
    border-radius: 0;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding: 8px 20px;
    color: #222529;
    border: 2px solid #e7e7e7;
    height: auto;
    display: inline-block;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 1.65px;
    line-height: 1.3333;
    transition: all .3s;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.recent-posts a.readmore:hover {
    color: #fff;
    background-color: #606da6;
    border-color: #606da6;
}
</style>

cms_block.title: Porto - Homepage 29
cms_block.content:
<style>
.main-container {
    display: none;
}
.highlighted-word {
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
    background-position: right bottom !important;
    padding-bottom: 8px;
}
.gift-finder-form select {
    height: 46px;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 13px;
    line-height: 1.42857;
    box-shadow: none !important;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
    padding: 8px 12px;
    padding-right: 25px;
    color: #777;
    font-family: inherit;
    border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.09);
    width: 100%;
}
.home-banners .porto-ultimate-content-box-container:before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 188px;
    left: 0;
    height: 100%;
    background: #fff;
    transition: right .25s,background .25s;
    z-index: 1;
}
.home-banners .porto-ultimate-content-box-container:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    height: 100%;
    border-right: 215px solid;
    opacity: .7;
    border-top: 180px solid transparent;
    border-bottom: 180px solid transparent;
    z-index: 1;
}
.home-banners .porto-ultimate-content-box:after {
    content: '';
    border-bottom: 180px solid #fff;
    border-right: 188px solid transparent;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    right: 0;
    transition: border-right .25s,border-bottom-color .25s;
    display: block;
    z-index: 1;
}
.home-banners .porto-ultimate-content-box:before {
    content: '';
    border-top: 180px solid #fff;
    border-right: 188px solid transparent;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    transition: border-right .25s,border-top-color .25s;
    display: block;
    z-index: 1;
    left: auto;
    bottom: auto;
    opacity: 1;
    background: none;
}
.home-banners .porto-ultimate-content-box > * {
    z-index: 2;
}
.home-banners .porto-ultimate-content-box-container:hover > div:before, .home-banners .porto-ultimate-content-box-container:hover > div:after {
    border-right-width: 215px;
    border-bottom-color: #fcfcfc;
    border-top-color: #fcfcfc;
}
.home-banners .porto-ultimate-content-box-container:hover:before {
    right: 215px;
    background: #fcfcfc;
}
.homepage-bar {
    background-color: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #e7e7e7;
    padding-top: 18px;
    padding-bottom: 18px;
}
.homepage-bar .col-lg-4 {
    border-left-color: #e7e7e7;
    border-left-width: 1px;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
}
.homepage-bar [class*=" icon-"], .homepage-bar [class^=icon-], .homepage-bar [class*=" porto-new-icon-"], .homepage-bar [class^=porto-new-icon-] {
    font-size: 32px;
}
.homepage-bar .row {
    margin: 0;
}
.homepage-bar .row > div {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}
.homepage-bar .col-lg-4 > * {
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: middle;
}
.homepage-bar h3 {
    line-height: 1;
    margin-bottom: 3px;
    font-family: 'Open Sans';
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #222529;
}
.homepage-bar p {
    font-size: 13px;
    margin: 0;
    line-height: 1;
    font-family: 'Open Sans';
    font-weight: 300;
}
@media (max-width: 991px) {
    .homepage-bar {
        padding: 0;
    }
    .homepage-bar .col-lg-4 {
        border-top: 1px solid #e7e7e7;
        padding-top: 18px;
        padding-bottom: 18px;
    }
    .homepage-bar .col-lg-4:first-child {
        border-top: 0;
    }
}
#gift_product .category-products .products-grid {
    margin: 0;
}
#gift_product .item-area a.quickview-icon, #gift_product .products-grid .ratings, #gift_product .item .details-area .actions {
    display: none;
}
</style>
